createLimitOrder: Use this form to create a limit order operation.

sellAmount.label: Amount
sellAmount.buyDescription: The amount of {{asset}} you plan on buying
sellAmount.sellDescription: The amount of {{asset}} you plan on selling

sellTotal.label: Total
sellTotal.buyDescription: The total {{asset}} you plan on selling

expiry.label: Limit Order Expiration
expiry.fkillDescription: This order immediately expires if not fillable
expiry.generalDescription: This limit order will expire {{expiryType}} after broadcast

osoValue.description: Automatic OSO function will be active

osoEnabled.spreadPercentDescription: How far the price of the take profit order differs from the original order

osoSize.sizePercentDescription: Percentage to sell in the take profit order

repeatValue.label: Set OSO to automatically repeat?
repeatValue.description: Automates repeated OSO based limit orders

fee.label: Fee
fee.description: The network fee to broadcast this operation

marketFees.label: Market fee
marketFees.description: The market fee applied by asset issuer

sellAmount2.buyDescription: The amount of ? you plan on buying
sellAmount2.sellDescription: The amount of ? you plan on selling

sellTotal2.label: Total
sellTotal2.buyDescription: The total ? you plan on selling
